context: 2005 was a pivotal year for Gartner as it acquired META Group, one of its chief rivals in IT research. This strategic acquisition eliminated marketplace overlap and brought in additional talented analysts and client relationships. Gartner also acquired AMR and Burton Group to expand its global operations.

competitors.name: Forrester Research
competitors.notes: Major competitor with similar business model of reports, advisory services, and events; Forrester Wave reports compete with Gartner's Magic Quadrant

competitors.name: IDC (International Data Corporation)
competitors.notes: Strong competitor founded 1964; IDC MarketScape is equivalent to Gartner's Magic Quadrant; over 50 countries presence

competitors.notes: Direct competitor eventually acquired by Gartner
